### âš ï¸ Commit Format Reminder

<type>(<scope>): <description>

[optional body]

[optional footer]

text


**Examples:**
feat(cli): add verbose flag
fix(config): handle missing file gracefully
feat!: change config format

BREAKING CHANGE: config.json renamed to config.yaml
